label: 72-gate symmetry approx continuous SU(3)
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Use registry values
ROOTS = reg.roots_total  # 288

# 72 gates x 3 = 216 group bridge to Lie algebra
# 72 = ROOTS / 4
gates = ROOTS // 4  # 72
su3_bridge = gates * 3  # 216
result = su3_bridge
note: Gate 14: Sum(72x3) group bridge to Lie Algebra
